body_html:
In your roi_polling.cc file, all GPU related code must be encapsulated by #if GOOGLE_CUDA #endif.

To make debugging easier, would you please do the following:

  1. Remove all GPU code, include removing them from the build file.
  2. Build with -c opt only and see if you can load the .so successfully.

If that works, then add the GPU code.

Please following instructions here https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/how_tos/adding_an_op/index.html
step by step.

Sherry
